languages.text: "Вы отличный боец, сестра, но если позволите — излишне импульсивный".
"You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."
languages.original_text: "Вы отличный боец, сестра, но если позволите — излишне импульсивный".

traits.locale_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你是位出色的战士，修女。不过，如果允许我实话实说的话，你实在是太冲动了。”
languages.original_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."

traits.locale_text: “你是位出色的战士，修女。不过，如果允许我实话实说的话，你实在是太冲动了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Es usted una guerrera formidable, hermana, pero, si me permite la indiscreción, es demasiado impulsiva».
languages.original_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."

traits.locale_text: «Es usted una guerrera formidable, hermana, pero, si me permite la indiscreción, es demasiado impulsiva».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたは優秀な戦士だ、シスター。だが…単刀直入に言わせてもらえれば、あなたは少々衝動的に過ぎる」
languages.original_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは優秀な戦士だ、シスター。だが…単刀直入に言わせてもらえれば、あなたは少々衝動的に過ぎる」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid eine ausgezeichnete Kämpferin, Schwester, aber ... offen gesagt ... seid Ihr zu impulsiv."
languages.original_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid eine ausgezeichnete Kämpferin, Schwester, aber ... offen gesagt ... seid Ihr zu impulsiv."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous êtes une guerrière de talent, ma sœur. Mais pardonnez ma franchise, vous êtes trop impulsive. »
languages.original_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes une guerrière de talent, ma sœur. Mais pardonnez ma franchise, vous êtes trop impulsive. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."

languages.text: "Mükemmel bir savaşçısın Rahibe ama yorumumu mazur gör, biraz fazla fevrisin."
languages.original_text: "You are an excellent fighter, Sister, but — if I may be blunt — you are too impulsive."

traits.locale_text: "Mükemmel bir savaşçısın Rahibe ama yorumumu mazur gör, biraz fazla fevrisin."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
